alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 3:55PM CDT until August 05 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... West central Crockett County in west Tennessee... Tipton County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Dyer County in west Tennessee... Lauderdale County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Haywood County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ripley to near Ft Pillow to near Wilson, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Millington, Covington, Ripley, Fort Pillow State Park, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Brighton, Halls, Nutbush, Forked Deer, Fulton, Chestnut Bluff, Dixonville, Ashport, Ft Pillow, Tipton, Atoka, Mason and Henning. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
